data.text: @pushpendraBJP96 Hi Pushpendra, we'd look into this for you. Please be more specific about the issue via DM so we could assist you further.  https://t.co/lSShhuwJdf

@SakataKartik Hi Kartik, we hear you and apologise for the delay that you've experienced. We work hard to run an on-time airline; however, unforeseen events sometimes challenge us. Sorry, this happened with your flight. In the future, we'll try harder to meet your expectations.

urls.title: Go First's Easy Web Check In for Domestic & International Flights
urls.description: Ensure social distancing with web check-in. Provide the relevant details and get your check-in process done within a few minutes. Learn more now.
